name: Cyberspace Hub
description: The hub is a buzzing hive of activity, where hackers, corporate spies, and rogue AI entities congregate. The air crackles with the energy of countless data streams flowing through augmented reality interfaces. Amidst the chaos, alliances are forged, deals are made, and virtual battles are waged in the neon-illuminated shadows of the cybernetic domain.

name: Retro Diner
description: In stark contrast to the high-tech surroundings, the retro diner is a charming throwback to simpler times. The neon sign displays a dancing hamburger, and the checkered floor lends a certain vintage charm. Although the food is all synthetically created, the flavors offer the comforting illusion of natural ingredients.

name: Underground Market
description: Deep beneath the towering structures of Neon City lies the sprawling maze of the Underground Market. Here, in this lawless den cloaked in neon shadows, the hottest commodities aren't food or clothing - they're tech relics, information, and cybernetic enhancements. For the right price, one can procure almost anything here.

name: Corporate Overlook
description: High above the chaotic streets of Neon City stands the Corporate Overlook, a towering fortress of glass and steel. It is a symbol of power for those who rule the city, a perch from which they can watch the city they manipulate so heavily. The panoramic view offers a breathtaking vista of neon-drenched cityscape.
